conclusion: Analyze the scene considering power, collision, and deflection effects.

A's path is towards the red blocks, which are aligned horizontally.
The red blocks are the first set of obstacles A will encounter.

Depending on the power and angle of collision, A may either stop or continue moving.

After colliding with the red blocks, A may come to a stop due to the combined resistance and deflection from the blocks.
